column3:
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8258/commits/409f83322e9fe3257cf9f3f61813195ac1aaa20c

Without this change, the current master shows (RPC `getblockchaininfo`):

```
    "segwit": {
      "status": "failed",
      "startTime": 0,
      "timeout": 0
    }
```
This needs backport to 0.12, but will only merge cleanly after segwit.\n
@laanwj I don't think a backport is needed since we won't release a backport with undefined softfork\n
